detectors.description:
Unipool.notifyRewardAmount(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#686-701) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-rewardRate = reward.div(DURATION) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#692)
	-leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#695)

	-[leftover = remaining.mul(rewardRate)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#L695)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Unipool.exit() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#666-669):
	External calls:
	- withdraw(balanceOf(msg.sender)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#667)
		- uni.safeTransfer(msg.sender,amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#589)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#520)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#668)
		- coin.safeTransfer(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#675)
		- (success,returndata) = address(token).call(data) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#520)
		- cred.safeTransfer(msg.sender,credReward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#679)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#668)
		- lastUpdateTime = lastTimeRewardApplicable() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#619)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#668)
		- rewardPerTokenStored = rewardPerToken() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#618)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#668)
		- rewards[msg.sender] = 0 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#674)
		- rewards[account] = earned(account) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#621)
	- getReward() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#668)
		- userRewardPerTokenPaid[account] = rewardPerTokenStored (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Unipool__3.sol#622)
